title: Nenshou-kei Mahou Shoujo Yamato na Meteor
original_name: 燃焼系魔法少女やまとなめてお
sinopse:
Planet Earth is besieged by an increasing number of large meteors, and only magical girls can save humanity from the extraterrestrial threat. Yamato Ippongi, a naive but energetic girl, enters the world of magical girls after a chance encounter with a "space fairy" named Mappa.

(Source: Mag Garden, translated)
